head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths YOUNG, DR. GEORGE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths YOUNG, DR. GEORGE

block.p: YOUNG-Dr. George. The members of Scarsdale Synagogue - Tremont Temple mourn the death of Dr. George Young, a devoted member of our congregation. We extend our condolences to his wife Judith, his children Suzanne, Robert, Lawrence, Cheryl and deceased son Seth, and the entire family. Stephen A. Klein, Rabbi Gerald Cohen, President

YOUNG-Dr. George. The members of Scarsdale Synagogue - Tremont Temple mourn the death of Dr. George Young, a devoted member of our congregation. We extend our condolences to his wife Judith, his children Suzanne, Robert, Lawrence, Cheryl and deceased son Seth, and the entire family. Stephen A. Klein, Rabbi Gerald Cohen, President
